1.title: Discounted Reunion

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

1.plot: The Doctor, five years after the events of leaving Derning in Fading Entity is skulking, before being taken on an adventure where he meets Avalon as they hunt down a new signal with a bounty hunter on their trail who wants them dead, but for what cause?

1.title: Unearthly Secrets

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

1.plot: Arrested for breaking into a secure location, The Doctor is interrogated for his crime. But surely, outside when a spaceship has arrived in the atmosphere, you're going to need his help.

2.title: The Stain of Expression

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

2.plot: A castle in the middle of the country, and the Doctor? His wonder about things gets him into a battle amongst the stuff of nightmares - or knightmares to be more exact.

3.title: The Blessing

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

3.plot: The Doctor is sent up to an abandoned facility by a "friend" of his who seems to have found a couple of people missing - but it's only time before a foe needs to kill them off - forever, it could seem.

4.title: Resistant Technology

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

4.plot: Web cameras are all the rage in this new technological world - but web cameras that kill people? Now that's something that the Doctor can get in and help.

5.title: Economic Destruction

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

5.plot: When cracks start opening up in the universe, The Doctor is quick to notice - but when another incarnation joins in - sparks begin to fly as they hunt down what or who did this?

6.title: Heartless Dominion

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

6.plot: After a Doctor with hair that rivals the color and shade of sunset lands in front of the main Doctor and Avalon, they all decide to follow a trace to a different Time Lord - more specifically a megalomaniac who is hell bent on destroying the world. So, just another day in the office then.

8.title: Fading Entity

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (TV Series 2017–2019)

8.plot: The final adventure begins for the Doctor as a lone distress beacon presents him a high amount of adrenaline as he and his Time-Lady companion, Derning are taken to a spaceship hitting the atmosphere and many other places that will uncover a truth that has been kept especially secret for all this time - and it will kill him.

imdb.title: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles
akas: Doctor Who: The Northern Chronicles (United Kingdom)
plot: The Doctor, now a bloke from 'The North' wants to be himself, as per usual of the role of the Doctor. Problem is - he's the Doctor - he's got a whole load of monsters, people and many people to care about. Well, where do we start?::Aiden James
